confidenceLevel.description: Confidence level for statistical analysis of stochastic experiments
confidenceLevel.name: Confidence level

currentDate.description: The day the experiment starts, in YYYY/MM/DD HH:MM:DD format
currentDate.name: Simulation start time

ke_url.description: The URL for KE tool to access the data set
ke_url.title: URL for Knowledge Extraction Spreadsheet

numberOfAntsPerGenerations.description: Number of scenarios per optimization generation
numberOfAntsPerGenerations.title: Number of scenarios per optimization generation

numberOfAntsForStochasticEvaluationInGen.description: Number of Ants to evaluate stochastically in generation
numberOfAntsForStochasticEvaluationInGen.title: Number of Ants to evaluate stochastically in generation

numberOfReplicationsInGeneration.description: Number of replications for Ants that are evaluated stochastically in generation
numberOfReplicationsInGeneration.title: Number of replications for Ants that are evaluated stochastically in generation

numberOfAntsForStochasticEvaluationInThe.description: Number of Ants to evaluate stochastically in the end of ACO
numberOfAntsForStochasticEvaluationInThe.title: Number of Ants to evaluate stochastically in the end of ACO

numberOfReplicationsInTheEnd.description: Number of replications for Ants that are evaluated in the end of ACO
numberOfReplicationsInTheEnd.title: Number of replications for Ants that are evaluated in the end of ACO

numberOfAntsForNextGeneration.description: Number of Ants that carry their pheromone in the next generation
numberOfAntsForNextGeneration.title: Number of Ants that carry their pheromone in the next generation

processTimeout.description: Number of seconds before the calculation process is interrupted
processTimeout.name: Process timeout

seed.description: When using the same seed, the random number generator produce the same sequence of numbers
seed.name: Seed for random number generator

timeUnit.description: Used for input and reporting widgets.
timeUnit.name: Time unit

trace.description: Create an excel trace file (Yes or No)
trace.name: Output Trace

wipSource.description: Would the WIP be inputted by KE tool or Manually
wipSource.name: WIP Source. Would the WIP be inputted by KE or Manually?

columns.name: Assignment to machines with higher WIPB
Machines with furthest last assignment time
# units complete but not passed on

Dream.BatchDecomposition.description: A station that decomposes a batch into sub-batches
Dream.BatchDecomposition.name: Decomposition

Dream.BatchDecompositionStartTime.description: A station that decomposes batches into sub-batches
Dream.BatchDecompositionStartTime.name: Decomposition

Dream.BatchReassembly.description: A station that assembles sub-batches back into a parent batch
Dream.BatchReassembly.name: Reassembly

processingTime.description: The time that this station needs in order to process a unit
processingTime.name: Processing time (per unit)

workingBatchSize.name: Working batch size in this station

Dream.BatchScrapMachine.description: A station processing batches for some time given by a distribution provided by the entities that are processed. A random number of batch units is scrapped
Dream.BatchScrapMachine.name: Machine

batchNumberOfUnits.description: the number of units of the created batches
batchNumberOfUnits.name: Number Of Units

argumentDict.description: arguments to be used by the method

Dream.Exit.description: A station where entities exits from the system
Dream.Exit.name: Exit

Dream.LineClearance.description: A buffer where entities of the same group can be held until the next station is ready to process them. Entities of other groups cannot be accepted
Dream.LineClearance.name: Clearance

Dream.Queue.description: A buffer where entities can be hold until the next station is ready to process them
Dream.Queue.name: Queue

Dream.RoutingQueue.description: A buffer that directs sub-batches of the same batch directed to the same machine
Dream.RoutingQueue.name: RoutingQueue

_capacity.description: capacity of the queue. -1 means infinite
_capacity.name: Capacity

failureDistribution.description: Is this machine subject to failures, if not then Time to Repair and Time to failure are ignored
failureDistribution.name: Has failure ?

_operationType.description: the type of operations that are performed manually in the machine
_operationType.name: Operation type
